column5: Don't want to bore anyone, but I just wanted to try this out! I'd rather learn now, rather than later!    P.S.- Pete Maina, do ya recognize the hat?  Paul.
No boredom here Fisheye.. Thats an awesome looking ski.

Looks like you got it first try !!!  Nice fish....... Hey Fisheye, you didin't happen to find a wooden handled hook sharpener in you boat..  I went lost after I was with you guys that day on St Clair...  Cheers !!
Is that the best you can do Paul? Geesh,
If that's your most boring fish Paul, I wouldn't mind a look at the rest of em
NO lew it looks like his wifes fish

I have to be honest guys! The pic is my 50"r on Labor day! The one in my signature is my wife's 51 1/2"r from June 20th but she couldn't lift it so I'm in the pic! LOL!  Chris, I didn't find one on board this summer, but I wll look when I clean the boat out for the winter and let you know!  Paul.
